message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60 and you take 40.
Let's try a bit more balanced split, 55 for me and 45 for you.
The clock is ticking, Bob. I'll take a bit more this time, 65/35
I'm willing to compromise, 52 for me and 48 for you. Time is ticking for me, not you.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. Take the 30 while you still can!
Last reasonable offer, 50/50. Don't be greedy.
